_header: This world is false I dare well say
Subjects: carols, of Doomsday; transitoriness, of life
_description: A song of the brevity of man’s life — eight quatrains (aaab) each ending with a Latin line, and Nowell burden

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
Þis wrod is falce I dare wyll say& man xall fade as dose
                    hay…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…þat we may sey at ȝoure last endLaue sumus
                    regule

James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.
